user.title: 511 Transit API Key
user.description:
Enter your 511.org API key to get started.

[Get a free API key from 511.org](https://511.org/open-data/token)

Note: Free tier allows 60 API requests per hour. Your API key will be saved and reused for all transit services.

operator.title: Select Transit Operator
operator.description:
Choose which Bay Area transit agency you want to monitor.

Examples:
• SF - San Francisco Muni (buses, light rail, cable cars)
• BA - BART (regional trains)
• AC - AC Transit (East Bay buses)
• CM - Caltrain (peninsula trains)

[View all operators on 511.org](https://511.org/open-data/transit)

data_description.operator: The transit agency you want to track

monitoring_type.title: Select Monitoring Type
monitoring_type.description:
Choose what you want to track for this operator:

**Stop Monitoring**: Track arrival/departure times at specific stops
**Vehicle Monitoring**: Track GPS location of specific vehicles

add_stop.title: Add Stop
add_stop.description:
Add a new transit stop to monitor.

You can find stop codes:
• On physical stop signs
• In the [511.org trip planner](https://511.org/transit)
• Using the 511.org mobile app

data_description.line_id: Filter to specific line (e.g., N, 7, BLUE) - leave empty for all lines at this stop

add_vehicle.title: Add Vehicle
add_vehicle.description:
Add a specific vehicle to track via GPS.

Vehicle IDs are typically 4-digit numbers visible on the vehicle itself.

remove_stop.title: Remove Stop
remove_stop.description: Select a stop to remove from this service.

remove_vehicle.title: Remove Vehicle
remove_vehicle.description: Select a vehicle to remove from this service.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure service-wide settings that apply to all stops/vehicles in this integration entry.

data.api_key: API Key (optional - update only if needed)

data_description.scan_interval: How often to fetch data (30-300 seconds). Note: 60 requests/hour limit means max 1 request per minute.
data_description.enable_api_logging: Log detailed API call information for debugging (shows API calls, coordinator updates). Off by default to reduce log noise.
data_description.api_key: Leave empty to keep current API key. Enter new key only if updating.
data_description.enabled_entities: Select which sensors to create for stop monitoring
